ValidationRule.description: The record's Inquiry object is related to a specific record type called"Exclusive_Project"and the Status field is set to "Submitted"OR The Inquiry object is related to a record type other than"Exclusive_Project"and the Status field is set to"KYC Submitted
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( ISPICKVAL(AML_Type__c, 'Individual'), RecordType.Name = 'UAE', OR ( AND ( Inquiry__r.RecordType.DeveloperName = "Exclusive_Project", ISPICKVAL( Status__c , 'Submitted') ) , AND ( Inquiry__r.RecordType.DeveloperName <> "Exclusive_Project", ISPICKVAL( Status__c , 'KYC Submitted') ) ) , NOT( ISBLANK(Contact__c )), (ISBLANK(Nationality__c ) || ISBLANK(Country_Of_Birth__c )|| ISBLANK(Country_Of_Residence__c )|| ISBLANK(Source_of_Fund_Wealth__c ) || ISBLANK(Employment_Type__c ) || ISBLANK(Business_Location__c )|| ISBLANK(Screening_Shareholder__c ) || ISBLANK(Mode_of_Payment__c )|| ISBLANK(Industry__c ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: All Individual AML Parameters are Required.
